name: And Dream of Sheep/Drowning
description: And Dream of Sheep/Drowning pays homage to The Ninth Wave, a suite from the album Hounds of Love by the UK artist Kate Bush. In this song Kate is drowning somewhere at open sea and as fear and despair take over her she asks for death/sleep - "Let me be weak. Let me sleep. And Dream of Sheep". I see it all as a figure not only to someone who is actually drowning at sea but someone who is drowning with depression, anxiety, and the hardships of life as well. @chiba.arte
